OOC: PLEASE READ THIS!!!!!!!! this post explains my new story 
line!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

:::Child looked at gigatron with a smile on his face. He could now explain:::

Child: "No, the peace talks had to be carried out bye Vulois but he never was 
successful. We must go to the next and most in important part of the Mission: 
To create the Republic of Heaven. As of now there are organic angels 
scattered threw out the universe . We must bring them together in a place we 
create. In order to do that we must heave the help of the maximals. so in 
three days we will go to the maximal base and hold a conference. we must get 
some scientists to help us research and create the city. If we all work 
together and open the secret vaults of knowledge hidden in the bellows of 
heaven then we will known as the Greatest sparks to walk any earth! and know 
my friends i show you one more miracle for I must also begin the age of 
organic. You are fine as you are, but to cary out this mission i must be 
organic in full!"

:::Child lifted his hands and let light pour from his body. The light swirled 
around him as he began to change. He looked like what humans call angels (A 
humanoid body and face with large dove wings) he was also granted close. a 
flowing whit rob and cape. His hair was gleaming gold and his eyes were deep 
blue. Child transformed,m He became a large white wolf with huge snow white 
wings and deep blue eyes. he transformed back ad spoke to his followers:::

Child: "I am organic! Now we can Begin to build The Republic of Heaven!!!!!!"
